1.00.name: wordpress/latest-canadian-healthcare-jobs-sidebar-widget
1.00.description:
Hospital.ca is a job listing service that receives many new Canadian medical and health care job openings every day (doctor/nurse/therapist/etc). By using this widget you and your site/blog visitors will be able to see on a clickable map if any are posted nearby (or in a part of the country that you might be interested in moving to).

Features

  • You can select a light or a dark color scheme for the widget.
